pr_title: GEODE-7591: Fix for hang in ClusterDistributionManager

timeline.message:
GEODE-7591: Fix for hang in ClusterDistributionManager

Added timeout after which it will be periodically checked whether
distribution manager is disconnecting while waiting on the membership
view installation to avoid hanging

timeline.bodyText: pauses like this often cause tests to periodically fail in CI.  Waiting for a semaphore to be triggered by the executor thread might be better.
timeline.author: bschuchardt

replies.author: kirklund

replies.bodyText: Thank you both for the comments and elaborate proposal! I will update test as Kirk suggested.

timeline.message:
DUnit test updated

* CyclicBarrier thread synchronization used instad await()
* Future used to wait for completion of test

timeline.bodyText: You can delete the catch-block and use of errorCollector in the main thread. You only need to do that inside the Runnable that you submitted. From line 400 on, it's better to just let the Exceptions percolate out of the test method and let junit catch it.
